title: Remind a Friend
summary: The simplest & most efficient reminder tool in the world. Now for smart-watches!
description: The simplest & most efficient communication tool in the world.Send notifications to your friends. Reminder allows users to leave a message for their friends at a specific time or location. When recipients are in the vicinity of the message, a notification pops up, reading, say, "Good luck on your exam," or, "Don't forget to take out the trash."+ reminders alarm+ location messages+ Android wear smartwatch supportsend fast notifications right from your wrist in seconds+ Google Glass supportFor example, do you have that friend who’s always late for dinner plans? Don’t waste your time waiting for the text that reads, “I’m here, where are you?" Just leave them a “drop” for when they arrive at the restaurant. The second they show up, a push notification will let them know you're flirting it up at the bar instead of waiting lonely and impatiently at a table in the back.Application is using Google location service, please ensure Google services is turned on#ProximityInternet #Local #Messaging #LocationBasedServices #SocialMedia #GoogleGlass #Wear
descriptionHTML:
The simplest & most efficient communication tool in the world.

Send notifications to your friends. Reminder allows users to leave a message for their friends at a specific time or location. When recipients are in the vicinity of the message, a notification pops up, reading, say, "Good luck on your exam," or, "Don't forget to take out the trash."

+ reminders alarm
+ location messages
+ Android wear smartwatch support
send fast notifications right from your wrist in seconds
+ Google Glass support


For example, do you have that friend who’s always late for dinner plans? Don’t waste your time waiting for the text that reads, “I’m here, where are you?" Just leave them a “drop” for when they arrive at the restaurant. The second they show up, a push notification will let them know you're flirting it up at the bar instead of waiting lonely and impatiently at a table in the back.


Application is using Google location service, please ensure Google services is turned on

#ProximityInternet #Local #Messaging #LocationBasedServices #SocialMedia #GoogleGlass #Wear
recentChanges: Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements!
